author: Eric C
title: Marriott at its Best
text:
Returning home after a 2week vacation in the Hawaiian Islands we wanted to breakup the rather long flight and 6 hour time change so we stopped in San Francisco.
We decided to stay at SFO airport location for convenience and we were familiar with this hotel from a previous visit.
Right from the beginning it was a pleasure, the shuttle driver was quite polite and so helpful with our heavy bags.
Next to check in which was fast and efficient .
As a frequent traveler and Platinum member I am pretty picky about room type and location .They handled it seamlessly.
Our room was immaculate and updated.
The housekeepers polite and helpful.
Their better dinning room was well designed and comfortable .
Most important the food and service was excellent !Our server KAIT went above and beyond, especially since they misplaced our order.After ordering it took almost an hour before they delivered it.
The Manager was summoned, a very nice young man who apologized profusely and offered to comp our meal and drinks, without me asking,nice surprise.Some snafu in the kitchen but they made it all right in the end.
Very good experience overall!
We will come back next time we are in the area.
